title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente. Reserve 1/2 cup pasta water.
Fry bacon until crisp. Turn off heat.
Whisk eggs, parmesan, and pepper in a bowl.
Toss drained pasta into the pan with bacon (off heat).
Pour egg mixture and toss quickly, adding pasta water as needed to make it creamy.
Serve immediately with extra parmesan and pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Grilled chicken cooked in a rich, creamy tomato sauce with warm spices.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices for at least 30 minutes.
Sear chicken pieces until lightly browned; remove.
Simmer tomatoes with garlic, ginger, and spices for 10 minutes.
Add cream and return chicken to the sauce; cook until done.
